}} The '1978–79 Football League Cup' was the 19th season of the
Football League Cup, a knockout competition for England's top 92 football
clubs. The competition started on the 12 August 1978 and ended with the final
on 17 March 1979.

The final was contested by First Division teams Nottingham Forest and
Southampton at Wembley Stadium in London.
categories: Nottingham Forest F.C. matches|League Cup Final 1979
